site_name: KIDBROOKE VILLAGE CENTRE (PHASE 3), KIDBROOKE MASTERPLAN, KIDBROOKE, LONDON, SE3
description: The erection of residential units, publicly accessible open space and associated access, carparking, cycle parking and landscaping, erection of a new pavilion buildingwithin the Park. The proposals result in the uplift of residential unitscompared to approved Planning Permission ref. 14/2611/F (as amended).Additional application details for consultation: Erection of 526 residentialunits (Use Class C3), publicly accessible open space and associated access,car parking, cycle parking and landscaping, erection of a new pavilionbuilding within the Park (Use Class Sui Generis comprising 215sqm GEA).The proposals result in the uplift of 144 residential units compared toapproved Planning Permission ref. 14/2611/F (as amended). (Departurefrom the Development Plan)
